content.p: Career Currently, she is the programme assistant for the FEE EcoCampus Programme at WWF Malaysia. Should the opportunity arise, Dharshinie plans on continuing her studies into the field of marine conservation. In addition, she plans on venturing into the field of environmental education as she believes that education will be able empower individuals with knowledge to play their part in environmental conservation. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
